a.span: MI School Data Visit Our Dashboard

div.p: A Hamilton education ... where each will thrive.

Acknowledging the changing local, regional, and global realities faced by Hamilton Community Schools graduates, our Board of Education reviewed and updated its vision and mission statements in early 2017, as well as the district goals.

strong.a: Our new vision and mission statement

div.p: Then in 2018, the Hamilton Community Schools leadership team developed a new Instructional Model and coined the term "Each Will Thrive," based on the updated vision. The model is based on four pillars:

div.h2: Keep Up to Date District News

div.p: Parents of 8th graders, while this might be a little surprising or nerve racking, your student is ready or will be soon for driver's education.

The OK Green Conference expected hundreds of sports competitions this spring. But after the season was canceled, as a sign of solidarity for the athletes affected, all the conference stadium lights were turned on at the same time.

div.div: Junior Colin Costello produces girls basketball team documentary

div.p: The Hamilton girls basketball team won the district title before the season was canceled. But that abrupt end couldn't ruin an incredible year.

a.aria-label: Junior Colin Costello produces girls basketball team documentary

div.div: Virtual mock interview & resume review opportunities

div.p: Are you going to apply for a summer job, internship, or career opportunity?

a.aria-label: Virtual mock interview & resume review opportunities

div.p: We created an archive of the communications Superintendent Dave Tebo has sent out to district families this spring concerning COVID-19.

div.div: Thank you to our 2019/2020 business partners

a.aria-label: Thank you to our 2019/2020 business partners

div.div: Hamilton's Continuity of Learning and COVID-19 Response Plan

div.p: Our Continuity of Learning and COVID-19 Response Plan has been approved.

a.aria-label: Hamilton's Continuity of Learning and COVID-19 Response Plan

div.div: Wireless hotspots available in Hamilton building parking lots

div.p: If you need Internet access, each of our main buildings has extended WiFi hotspots available in the surrounding parking lots!

a.aria-label: Wireless hotspots available in Hamilton building parking lots

div.p: We have a new resource page for Hamilton Community Schools students & families dealing with COVID-19!

img.alt: Photo of Hamilton Teacher Jana Zweering

div.div: Local business helps Hamilton teachers stay connected with students

div.p: Without hesitation, Don's Flowers agreed to donate hundreds and hundreds of envelopes to help teachers stay connected to their students.

a.aria-label: Local business helps Hamilton teachers stay connected with students

div.p: Many Hamilton Elementary staff members enjoyed creating their own #WeCanDoThis signs!
Food pickup is available every Tuesday and Friday from 11 a.m. to noon at Blue Star Elementary, Hamilton High School, and Bentheim Elementary.
